overview:
Carl Miller is Director of Software Technology at Enginuity PLM. He a member of the management team at Enginuity and his responsibilities include planning and coordinating the activities of the development team, leading the team using agile development process methodologies and ensuring the technology solutions delivered provide the best solutions for customer deployments.

Carl brings 30 years of software design, development and leadership experience to Enginuity. He has designed, developed and participated in enterprise level software systems throughout his career, working with Fortune 500 companies in several industry domains.

Carl was one of the primary partners at Box Mountain Systems during the 1980s â€“ developing commercial enterprise software for a Fortune 500 client base that included Exxon-Mobil and Cigna. Carl has worked with object oriented user groups since the late 1990s, and he has presented at a number of technical conferences.
